doc:
Bruno Podalydès https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruno_Podalyd%C3%A8s 0 Bruno Podalydès (born 11 March 1961) is a French writer, film director, producer and actor. His brother Denis Podalydès is also an actor. Bruno_Podalydès ( born 11_March_1961 ) is a_French_writer , film_director , producer_and_actor . His_brother_Denis_Podalydès is also an_actor .
